key.description: If set to true, hidden files will also be shown (files starting with a "." for example)

key.name: start-with-contextview
key.description: Show the context view pane

key.name: rgba-colormap
key.description: If set to true, rgba will be enabled, you'll need a gtk engine supporting rgba, like murrine. Compiz can have some problems like drawings shadows ...

key.name: date-format
key.description: The format of file dates. Possible values are "locale", "iso", and "informal".

key.name: single-click
key.description: Whether items are activated by single clicks instead of dubble clicks

key.name: single-click-timeout
key.description: The amount of time which the item under the mouse cursor will be selected automatically in single click mode. A value of 0 disables the automatic selection.

key.name: dialog-property-modal
key.description: If true the property dialog is a modal window

key.name: interpret-desktop-files
key.description: If true the desktop files would be interpreted, a desktop file can represent an executable, a directory etc. (their filename, type and some other properties would be the target ones)

key.name: contextview-orientation
key.description: Auto Context View Panel orientation means the panel would be horizontal or vertical depending on the size of your window.

key.name: default-viewmode
key.description: The default viewmode to be used when opening a new tab or window

key.name: toolbar-primary-css-style
key.description: Set the toolbar css style to primary-toolbar.

key.name: sidebar-icon-size
